searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT U1.CASE_CODE, U1.OUT_MORT_TYPE, U1.OUT_SRV_NAME, U1.REAL_PROCESSOR_NAME, U1.PROCESSOR_NAME, U1.BANK_ORG_NAME, U1.FA_ORG_NAME, U1.MORT_AMOUNT, U1.EVA_ORG_NAME, U1.WT_ORG_NAME, A.ClOSE_TIME, B.AGENT_NAME, E.PROPERTY_ADDR, O.org_name, C.SELLER, F.BUYER FROM ((SELECT M.CASE_CODE, '中原' AS OUT_MORT_TYPE, '商业贷款' AS OUT_SRV_NAME, U1.reaL_NAME AS REAL_PROCESSOR_NAME, D1.PROCESSOR_NAME, FO2.FIN_ORG_NAME AS BANK_ORG_NAME, FO3.FIN_ORG_NAME AS FA_ORG_NAME, M.COM_AMOUNT AS MORT_AMOUNT, FO1.FIN_ORG_NAME AS EVA_ORG_NAME, '' AS WT_ORG_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE M LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR P ON P.CASE_CODE = M.CASE_CODE AND P.SRV_CODE='3000400101' LEFT JOIN sctrans.sys_user U1 ON U1.ID = p.PROCESSOR_ID FULL OUTER JOIN ( SELECT tb.CASE_CODE, PROCESSOR_ID = stuff( ( SELECT '/' + PROCESSOR_ID FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR WHERE tb.CASE_CODE = CASE_CODE ORDER BY PROCESSOR_ID FOR xml path ('') ), 1, 1, '' ), PROCESSOR_NAME = stuff( ( SELECT '/' + US.REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR PR LEFT JOIN sctrans.sys_user US ON US.ID = PR.PROCESSOR_ID WHERE tb.CASE_CODE = PR.CASE_CODE ORDER BY PR.PROCESSOR_ID FOR xml path ('') ), 1, 1, '' ) FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR tb GROUP BY tb.CASE_CODE ) AS D1 ON M.CASE_CODE = D1.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_EVA_REPORT R ON R.CASE_CODE = M.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG FO1 ON FO1.FIN_ORG_CODE = R.FIN_ORG_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG FO2 ON FO2.FIN_ORG_CODE = M.LAST_LOAN_BANK LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG FO3 ON FO3.FIN_ORG_CODE = FO2.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE ) UNION( SELECT LA.CASE_CODE, '外拓' AS OUT_MORT_TYPE, D1.NAME AS OUT_SRV_NAME, U1.reaL_NAME AS REAL_PROCESSOR_NAME, U1.reaL_NAME AS PROCESSOR_NAME, '' AS BANK_ORG_NAME, '' AS FA_ORG_NAME, LA.ACTUAL_AMOUNT AS MORT_AMOUNT, '' AS EVA_ORG_NAME, FO.FIN_ORG_NAME AS WT_ORG_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_LOAN_AGENT LA LEFT JOIN sctrans.sys_user U1 ON U1.ID = LA.EXECUTOR_ID LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG FO ON FO.FIN_ORG_CODE = LA.FIN_ORG_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_DICT D1 ON D1.CODE = LA.LOAN_SRV_CODE )) U1 INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE AS A ON A.CASE_CODE = U1.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO AS B ON A.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB AS O ON O.user_id = B.AGENT_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TG1.CASE_CODE, SELLER = stuff( ( SELECT '/' + GUEST_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE TG1.CASE_CODE = CASE_CODE AND TRANS_POSITION = '30006001'
ORDER BY GUEST_NAME FOR xml path ('') ), 1, 1, '' ) FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO TG1 WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY TG1.CASE_CODE ) C ON A.CASE_CODE = C.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO AS E ON A.CASE_CODE = E.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TG1.CASE_CODE, BUYER = stuff( ( SELECT '/' + GUEST_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE TG1.CASE_CODE = CASE_CODE AND TRANS_POSITION = '30006002'
ORDER BY GUEST_NAME FOR xml path ('') ), 1, 1, '' )
FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO TG1 WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY TG1.CASE_CODE ) F ON A.CASE_CODE = F.CASE_CODE WHERE 1=1 <ifNotNull guestname> AND (C.SELLER LIKE '%'+#guestname#+'%' OR F.BUYER LIKE '%'+#guestname#+'%') </ifNotNull>
